alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 10:43AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations of a trace to a few hundredths of an inch. Little or no snow accumulation. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon and Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
